languages.text: {n}В голове начинает мутиться, а по вашим щекам скользят тягучие капли. Вы моргаете — и вот перед вами уже не Теодора, а предатель Кунрад, столь же зыбкий и мимолетный, как и предыдущий образ. Из его уст сочится тот же ужасающий глас.{/n} "Претендент обещал вернуться с трофеем — реликвией, что может послужить Пределу рассвета. Судьба была предначертана, шаги — определены. И все же... ты нарушил{mf||а} нерушимое, заняв место претендента. Я вижу тебя — в день, когда последний восход воздвигнется над железным миром. Я вижу тебя подле себя в день, когда я воскресну".

{n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."
languages.original_text: {n}В голове начинает мутиться, а по вашим щекам скользят тягучие капли. Вы моргаете — и вот перед вами уже не Теодора, а предатель Кунрад, столь же зыбкий и мимолетный, как и предыдущий образ. Из его уст сочится тот же ужасающий глас.{/n} "Претендент обещал вернуться с трофеем — реликвией, что может послужить Пределу рассвета. Судьба была предначертана, шаги — определены. traits.locale_text: {n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

{n}The daemon peers into you. Your head begins to spin, your stomach turns, and viscous drops slither down your cheeks.{/n} "This shard of reality drifting through my domain is merely the arena for the one who dared to vie for the favour of the Gods. The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable."

{n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

And yet... you broke the unbreakable."

It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

languages.text: {n}你感觉脑子仿佛旋转起来，胃里被什么东西不断搅动，粘稠的液滴沿着你的脸颊滑落。你眨了眨眼，你面前的人不再是西奥多拉，而是变成了维特威尔那个叛徒。他和之前的幻影一样飘忽不定、瞬息万变，他的口中发出了同样可怕的声音。{/n}“那位心怀决意的人发誓会带着圣物归来，为破晓锋刃服务。命运早已注定，结果已然显现。可你……你却篡夺了神选者的位置，打破了牢不可破的宿命。我已经看到了你——当终末黎明降临到金属世界时，当我复活的时刻到来时，我看见你站在我的身边。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

traits.locale_text: {n}这只恶魔凝视着你。你感觉脑子仿佛旋转起来，胃里被什么东西不断搅动，粘稠的液滴沿着你的脸颊滑落。{/n}“这块现实的碎片，在我的领域中飘荡着。它是一座竞技场，那些无畏之人会在这里争斗，赢取混沌诸神的宠爱。那些心怀决心的人发誓会带着圣物归来，让他们得到超越凡人的力量，那件圣物可以用来侍奉破晓锋刃。命运早已注定，结果已然显现。可你……你却打破了牢不可破的宿命。”

languages.text: {n}Tu cabeza empieza a dar vueltas y un líquido viscoso se desliza por tus mejillas. Parpadeas y de pronto ya no tienes delante a Theodora. Estás viendo al traidor de Voigtvir, tan fluido y efímero como la anterior aparición. La misma voz aterradora brota de sus labios. {/n} «El aspirante juró volver con un trofeo: una reliquia que puede servir al Filo del Amanecer. Ese destino quedó fijado y se decidieron los pasos necesarios. Y sin embargo... tú has roto lo irrompible al ocupar el lugar del aspirante. Te veo... en el día en que el Amanecer Final se yergue sobre el mundo de hierro. Ese día, el día de mi resurrección, te veo a mi lado».
languages.original_text: {n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

traits.locale_text: {n}El daemon mira en tu interior. Tu cabeza empieza a dar vueltas, tu estómago se revuelve y un líquido viscoso se desliza por tus mejillas.{/n} «Esta esquirla de la realidad a la deriva por mis dominios es solo un coliseo para quien se atreve a luchar por el favor de los dioses. El aspirante juró volver con un trofeo, obtener lo que eleva a un mortal sobre todos los demás: una reliquia que puede servir al Borde del Alba. Ese destino quedó fijado y se decidieron los pasos necesarios. Y sin embargo... tú has roto lo irrompible».

languages.text: {n}頭がぐるぐると回り始め、粘り気のある滴が頬を滑り落ちる。瞬きをすると…シオドーラは消えている。目の前にいるのは裏切り者のボイトヴィルだ。前の姿と同じように流動的で儚い存在である。彼の唇から、変わらず恐ろしい声が滲み出る…{/n}「その志願者は戦利品…つまりは暁の刃に役立つ遺物を携えて戻ることを誓った。その運命は確実なものであり、歩むべき道も選ばれていた。であるというのに…お前は志願者の代わりとなり、壊れぬものを壊した。私はお前を見た…鉄の世界に最後の夜明けが昇る日に。その日に、私の復活の日、私のそばにいるお前が見える」
languages.original_text: {n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

traits.locale_text: {n}ディーモンがあなたを覗き込む。頭が回転し始め、胃の中が逆流し、粘り気のある滴が頬を滑り落ちる。{/n} 「私の領域を漂っているこの現実の破片は、神の恩恵を求めてあえて争う者のための舞台に過ぎない。志願者は、トロフィーを手にして戻ってくることを誓った。それは死ぬ定めにある者を他者よりも偉大なものにする、つまりエッジ・オブ・デイブレイクに役立つかもしれない遺物だ。その運命は保証され、手順は選ばれた。しかし、それでも…お前は破壊できないものを破壊した」

{n}頭がぐるぐると回り始め、粘り気のある滴が頬を滑り落ちる。瞬きをすると…シオドーラは消えている。目の前にいるのは裏切り者のボイトヴィルだ。前の姿と同じように流動的で儚い存在である。彼の唇から、変わらず恐ろしい声が滲み出る…{/n}「その志願者は戦利品…つまりは暁の刃に役立つ遺物を携えて戻ることを誓った。その運命は確実なものであり、歩むべき道も選ばれていた。であるというのに…お前は志願者の代わりとなり、壊れぬものを壊した。私はお前を見た…鉄の世界に最後の夜明けが昇る日に。その日に、私の復活の日、私のそばにいるお前が見える」

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} de vertiges et des gouttes visqueuses glissent le long de vos joues. Vous clignez des yeux, et quand vous les rouvrez, ce n'est plus Théodora qui se tient devant vous, mais ce traître de Voigtvir, aussi impalpable et éphémère que l'apparition précédente. La même voix à faire froid dans le dos s'échappe de ses lèvres en chuintant.{/n} « Le prétendant avait juré de revenir avec un trophée, une relique qui pourrait servir la Lame de l'Aube. Ce destin était garanti et les étapes, choisies. Pourtant... vous avez brisé ce qui ne pouvait l'être lorsque vous avez pris sa place. Je vous vois, le jour où l'aube finale se lèvera sur le monde de fer. Je vous vois à mes côtés en ce jour de grâce, celui de ma résurrection. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le démon plonge son regard en vous. Vous êtes {mf|pris|prise} de vertiges, votre estomac se retourne et des gouttes visqueuses glissent le long de vos joues.{/n} « Ce fragment de réalité qui dérive en mon domaine n'est rien de plus qu'une arène pour celui qui ose se battre afin d'obtenir la faveur des dieux. Le prétendant avait juré de revenir avec un trophée, d'obtenir ce qui élève un mortel au-dessus de ses semblables : une relique qui pourrait servir la Lame de l'Aube. Ce destin était garanti et les étapes, choisies. Pourtant... vous avez brisé ce qui ne pouvait l'être. »

languages.text: {n}Dir wird schwindelig und zähflüssige Tropfen rinnen deine Wangen hinunter. Du zwinkerst ... und blickst nicht mehr Theodora an. Du siehst nun der Verräter Voigtvir, der ebenso fließend und flüchtig ist wie die vorherige Erscheinung. Seine Lippen pressen dieselbe entsetzliche Stimme hervor.{/n} "Der Aspirant hat geschworen, mit einer Trophäe zurückzukehren ... einem Relikt, das dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs zu dienen vermochte. Dieses Schicksal wurde gewährleistet, die Schritte dafür wurden gewählt. Und doch ... habt Ihr das Unzerbrechliche zerbrochen, als Ihr den Platz des Aspiranten eingenommen habt. Ich sehe Euch ... an dem Tag, an dem sich die letzte Dämmerung über der eisernen Welt erhebt. An jenem Tag sehe ich Euch an meiner Seite, am Tag meiner Wiedergeburt."
languages.original_text: {n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Blick des Dämons durchbohrt dich. Dir wird schwindelig, dein Magen dreht sich um, und zähflüssige Tropfen rinnen deine Wangen hinunter.{/n} "Dieser Splitter der Realität, der durch mein Reich treibt, ist lediglich die Arena für die Person, die es gewagt hat, um die Gunst der Götter zu buhlen. Der Aspirant schwor, mit einer Trophäe zurückzukehren, etwas zu beschaffen, das Sterbliche über andere erhebt – ein Relikt in Diensten des Randes des Tagesanbruchs. Dieses Schicksal wurde gewährleistet, die Schritte dafür wurden gewählt. Und dennoch ... habt Ihr das Unzerbrechliche zerbrochen."

languages.text: {n}Başın dönmeye ve yanaklarından koyu kıvamlı damlalar akmaya başlıyor. Göz kırpınca artık Theodora'ya bakmadığını fark ediyorsun. Karşında hain Voigtvir var. O da bir önceki tayf kadar akışkan ve gelip geçici duruyor. Dudaklarından aynı ürpertici ses kaynayıp taşıyor.{/n} "Talip, yanında bir ganimetle dönmeye ant içmişti. Tan Vakti'ne hizmet edebilecek bir yadigâr bulacaktı. Bu kader belirlenmiş, atılacak adımlar seçilmişti... Lakin sen talibin yerini alınca kesinleşmiş olanı da bozdun. Seni görüyorum, nihai şafağın demir dünyanın üzerinde yükseldiği günde. Dirileceğim o gün seni yanımda görüyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Your head begins to spin and viscous drops slither down your cheeks. You blink — and you are no longer looking at Theodora. It is the traitor Voigtvir, just as fluid and ephemeral as the previous apparition. The same terrifying voice seethes from his lips.{/n} "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak. That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable when you took the aspirant's place. I see you — on the day when the final dawn rises over the iron world. I see you by my side on that day, the day of my resurrection."

Tan Vakti'ne hizmet edebilecek bir yadigâr bulacaktı. Bu kader belirlenmiş, atılacak adımlar seçilmişti... Lakin sen talibin yerini alınca kesinleşmiş olanı da bozdun. Seni görüyorum, nihai şafağın demir dünyanın üzerinde yükseldiği günde. Dirileceğim o gün seni yanımda görüyorum."
